```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(readxl)
setwd("/Users/austinsechrest/Documents/Github/LISH-AFL-Project/Datasets")
afl<-read_excel("afl_with_injuries.xlsx")
```

```{r, eval=TRUE}
nmfc <- afl[afl$Home=="North Melbourne",]
geelong <- afl[afl$Home=="Geelong",]
nmfc_home_away <- afl[afl$Home=="North Melbourne" | afl$Away=="North Melbourne",]
geelong_home_away <- afl[afl$Home=="Geelong" | afl$Away=="Geelong",]
write.csv(nmfc, "nmfc_home.csv")
write.csv(nmfc_home_away, "nmfc_all.csv")
write.csv(geelong, "geelong_home.csv")
write.csv(geelong_home_away, "geelong_all.csv")
```
